duties_responsibilities.duty: Identifying qualified candidates through various outlets such as job boards, networking groups, and social media.
Assessing candidates through phone screening, interviewing, skills testing, and reference checks.
Maintaining and developing relationships with potential qualified candidates via phone and email communications.
Serving as the point of contact for candidates and clients to resolve any issues that may arise.
Consistently meeting and exceeding weekly and quarterly quotas.
Obtaining and generating sales leads and setting new meetings with potential clients.
Building strong networks throughout the assigned territory by joining associations, networking groups, and using social media.
Assisting in the development of recruiters.
Facilitating role plays with other recruiters in the office and completing role plays with managers per quarter.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred but not required
